objects.text:
• Premium OLED Dynamic Display
• Sleek Space Gray Aluminum Case
• Advanced Health Tracking
• Water-Resistant Design

product_details.name: Apple Watch Series - Elegant Fire Bloom Edition | Premium Smartwatch
product_details.description:
• Stunning Fire Bloom Watch Face - Premium OLED display with mesmerizing floral animation
• Sleek Space Gray Aluminum Case - Premium finish with scratch-resistant glass
• Comfortable Black Sport Band - Durable fluoroelastomer material for all-day wear
• Always-On Retina Display - Crystal clear visibility in any lighting condition
• Digital Crown with haptic feedback for precise navigation
• Water-resistant design suitable for swimming and everyday use
• Advanced health and fitness tracking capabilities
• Seamless integration with iPhone and Apple ecosystem
• Available in multiple case sizes to fit any wrist
• Custom watch faces with endless personalization options

banner_details:
The banner showcases a premium smartwatch advertisement with a sleek and modern aesthetic. At the top, the large, bold heading (`heading`) captures attention immediately, followed by a distinctive subheading (`subheading`) that highlights the edition name. A concise list of key features is presented in bullet points within the `description` text layer, emphasizing the product's technology and design. The product image (`product_image`) is prominently placed on the right, partially overlapping the central area for visual engagement. The price (`price`) is clearly displayed in bold near the bottom left, alongside a standout call-to-action button (`cta_button`) labeled with `cta` inviting users to shop. The background consists of layered rectangles and strokes in various opacities, creating depth and framing the content.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: `#0F0F0F` (background)
- Amber Orange: `#F0A040` (heading, accent lines, price, CTA button)
- Light Gray: `#E8E8E8` (subheading)
- White: `#FFFFFF` (description text)
- Charcoal Gray: `#121212` (content background block)
- Onyx: `#000000` (CTA text)
product_color: The product image showcases an elegant smartwatch with a captivating fiery watch face. The primary color palette includes deep black (#000000) for the strap and bezel, creating a base of sophistication and luxury. The display features dynamic blends of amber-orange (#FF8C42), molten gold (#D9822B), and bronze brown (#5C3B25), forming a glowing, molten core effect that suggests energy and innovation. White (#FFFFFF) and golden-yellow (#FFD700) accents on the clock hands provide contrast, enhancing visibility. These colors are well-blended yet strategically highlighted through sharp edges and reflective light, making them ideal for a sleek, dynamic advertisement banner.
